questions.question: What language adds interactivity to web pages?
questions.explanation: JavaScript makes web pages interactive and dynamic.

questions.question: Which keyword declares a variable that cannot be reassigned?
questions.explanation: const creates constants that cannot be reassigned.

questions.question: What function displays output in the browser console?
questions.explanation: console.log outputs messages to the browser console.

questions.question: What data type represents true or false?
questions.explanation: Boolean represents true or false values.

questions.question: Which operator checks equality without type conversion?
questions.explanation: === checks both value and type equality.

questions.question: What structure repeats code while a condition is true?
questions.explanation: Loops repeat code blocks based on conditions.

questions.question: Which method adds an element to the end of an array?
questions.explanation: push adds elements to the end of arrays.

questions.question: What object manipulates HTML elements?
questions.explanation: The DOM represents the document structure for manipulation.

questions.question: Which event fires when an element is clicked?
questions.explanation: onclick triggers when elements are clicked.

questions.question: What keyword defines a function?
questions.explanation: function keyword declares functions in JavaScript.
